Rayon Sports vs AS Kigali

Rayon Sports 0-0 AS Kigali

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Ngabo Roben

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

19:57

AS Kigali yiyongereye amahirwe yo kwegukana igikombe

Kunganya na Rayon Sports bifashije ikipe ya Masudi Djuma kuzuza amanota ane n'igitego kimwe izigamye. Irasabwa gutsinda Etincelles FC ku munsi wa nyuma w'irushanwa ikuzuza amanota arindwi.

Abakeba APR FC na Rayon Sports banganyije umukino usoza indi y'iki gikombe, AS Kigali yahita yegukana igikombe irusha Rayon Sports amanota abiri. APR FC itsinze yagitwara iyirusha inota rimwe naho Rayon Sports yo byasaba kubara umubare w'ibitego zizigamye.

Uko amakurikiranye ubu

1. Rayon Sports 4 (amanota), 2 (ibitego)
2. AS Kigali 4 (amanota), 1(igitego izigamye)
3. APR FC 3 (amanota), 3 (ibitego)
4. Etincelles FC 0 (amanota) -6 (umwenda w'ibitego)

19:51

Umukino urarangiye

Umukino wahuzaga Rayon Sports na AS Kigali urangiye amakipe yombi anganya 0-0.

19:47

88' Coup franc ya Rayon Sports

Rutahizamu Raphael Da Silva acenze Nova Bayama akorerwa ikosa na Bishira Latif haboneka Coup franc ariko Sarpong ayitera hejuru cyane

19:43

85' Ntate Djumaine ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo

Rayon Sports ikoze 'contre-attaque' Niyonzima Olivier Sefu yihuta cyane hagati mu kibuga akorerwa ikosa na Ntate Djumaine umukuruye imyenda bimuhesha ikarita y'umuhondo

19:43

85' Ntate Djumaine ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo

Rayon Sports ikoze 'contre-attaque' Niyonzima Olivier Sefu yihuta cyane hagati mu kibuga akorerwa ikosa na Ntate Djumaine umukuruye imyenda bimuhesha ikarita y'umuhondo

19:39

82' Gusimbuza ku ruhande rwa AS Kigali

Nyuma yo kugora cyane ba myugariro ba Rayon Sports akanahusha ibitego byabazwe, Ishimwe Kevin asimbujwe Benedata Janvier

19:37

79' Ishoti rikomeye rya Sefu ntacyo ribyaye

Ikipe ya AS Kigali irugarijwe. Umupira uzamukanywe na Da Silva ku ruhande rw'iburyo ahindura umupira mu rubuga rw'amahina ashaka Michael Sarpong nawe afungira umupira Niyonzima Olivier Sefu neza atera ishoti rikomeye ariko Bate Shamiru yongera kuba ibamba. Ahise aryama hasi ubu ari kwitabwaho n'abaganga

19:34

77' Bate Shamiru atabaye izamu rya AS Kigali

Rutahizamu Sarpong afashe umupira awuha neza mugenzi we bakomoka hamwe muri Ghana, Donkor Prosper Kuka atera ishoti rikomeye ashaka gutungura umunyezamu ariko Bate Shamiru arirambura awukuramo

19:28

70' Penaliti ya AS Kigali???

Umupira uzamukanywe neza na Ishimwe Kevin acenga Radu na Hussein Habimana ateye ishoti rikomeye umupira ukurwamo na Manzi Thierry benshi bakeka ko yawukozeho n'akaboko byari guhesha penaliti AS Kigali ariko umusifuzi Nsoro ntiyafata uwo mwanzuro. Masudi Djuma ntabwo abyumva

19:24

67' Iradukunda Eric akomeje kugora AS Kigali yavuyemo

Myugariro wo ku ruhande rw'iburyo wa Rayon Sports amaze guhindura imupira ine mu gice cya kabiri ashaka ba rutahizamu be Sarpong na DaSilva ariko ntibayibyaza umusaruro. Ari guha akazi gakomeye Jean Claude Niyomugabo bakinanye muri AS Kigali umwaka ushize

19:22

65' AS Kigali irasimbuje yongera imbaraga hagati mu kibuga

Nyuma yo kubona icyuho cya Zidane wahawe ikarita itukura, umutoza Masudi Djuma akuyemo rutahizamu Ibrahim Nshimiyimana aha umusimbuza umukinnyi wo hagati Fabrice Twizerimana bavanye muri APR FC ukina hagati yugarira

19:19

63' Gusimbuza ku ruhande rwa Rayon Sports

Eric Irambona agize ikibazo cy'imvune asimburwa na bazina we Eric Rutanga bombi bakina ku ruhande rw'ibumoso bugarira

19:18

Abakina hagati ba AS Kigali batangiye kugaragaza umunaniro

Ntamuhanga Tumaine Titi na Ntate Djumaine batangiye kugabanya umuvuduko bakoreshaga basatira. Ubu Rayon Sports niyo yihariye umukino

19:14

57' Rutahizamu DaSilva yinjiye mu kibuga asimbuye

Nyuma y'iminota 57 y'umusaruro muke wa Kevin Ndayisenga, asimbuwe n'umunya-Bresil Raphael Jonathan DaSilva

19:12

55' Ikarita y'umuhondo ku ruhande rwa Rayon Sports

Nova Bayama azamukanye umupira ku ruhande rw'iburyo akorerwa ikosa na myugariro w'ibumoso wa Rayon Sports Irambona Eric none Nsoro Ruzindana amuhaye ikarita y'umuhondo

19:09

53' Nyuma yo gusinya amasezerano y'amezi atandatu, rutahizamu Da Silva agiye gusimbura

AS Kigali ihawe ikarita y'umutuku umutoza Robertinho ahita ahagurutsa rutahizamu Raphael Jonathan DaSilva ngo ajye kwishyushya.

19:06

49' IKARITA ITUKURA IHAWE AS KIGALI

Mugisha Gilbert winjiye mu kibuga asimbuye azamukanye umupira ku ruhande rw'ibumoso yihuta aterwa 'Tackle' y'amaguru abiri na Nsabimana Eric Zidane akora ikosa rimuhesheje ikarita ya kabiri y'umuhondo, bimubyarira ikarita itukura. AS Kigali igiye gukina iminota isigaye ari abakinnyi 10

19:01

Igice cya kabiri cy'umukino kiratangiye

Nshimiyimana Ibrahim atangije igice cya kabiri, AS Kigali yongera gutangira neza ihererekanya

19:00

Abakinnyi bagarutse mu kibuga

Igice cya kabiri kigiye gutangira habaho impinduka ku ruhande rwa Rayon Sports aho Ndatimana Robert wari mu igeragezwa asimbujwe Gilbert Mugisha

18:45

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

Igice cya mbere cy'umukino uri guhuza Rayon Sports na AS Kigali kirangiye ikipe ya AS Kigali iri kwitwara neza cyane. Iminota 45 irangiye Rayon Sports idateye mu izamu na rimwe nta na koruneri ibonye. Rutahizamu uri mu igeragezwa Kevin Ndayisenga wakinnye iminota 11 mu mukino batsinzemo Etincelles FC ariko awuvamo adakoze ku mupira ntabwo n'uyu munsi byamworoheye kwigaragaza

18:42

Umunota umwe w'inyongera ku gice cya mbere

Iminota 45 y'igice cya mbere irangiye amakipe anganya 0-0 none bongeyeho umunota umwe

18:41

42' Gusimbuza kwa mbere ku ruhande rwa AS Kigali

Nyuma yo kubona impande ze zitari gukora uko yifuza, umutoza Masudi akuyemo Harerimana Rachid Leon atanga umwanya kuri Nova Bayama ugiye guhangana na Rayon Sports yamwirukanye mu kwezi gushize

18:40

40' Umutoza Masudi Djuma yahinduye umukino wa AS Kigali

Ikipe ya AS Kigali imaze iminota 10 yihariye umukino nubwo itarabona igitego. Masudi Djuma akomeje gusaba abakinnyi be kwirinda imipira miremira ahubwo bagahererekanya neza none byabahiriye

18:30

30' AS Kigali itsinze igitego umusifuzi aracyanga

Umupira uzamukanywe neza na Nshimiyimana Ibrahim acomekera umupira mwiza Ishimwe Kevin atazuyaje ahita ahindukiza Andre Mazimpaka urindira Rayon Sports ariko umusifuzi wo ku ruhande Safari Hamissi yemeza ko hari habayeho kurarira. Abafana ba APR FC bari muri stade bashyigikiye AS Kigali ntibabyumva

18:28

28' Niyonzima Olivier Sefu ahushije igitego cyabazwe

Sefu ukomeje kugora cyane abakina hagati muri AS Kigali afashe umupira acenga; Zidane, Tity na Ngando Omar asigarana n'umunyezamu Bate Shamiru ariko ishoti ry'imoso, akaguru atamenyere rica iruhande gato rw'izamu

18:24

25' Koruneri ya AS Kigali

Ishimwe Kevin azamukanye umupira acomekera Ibrahim Nshimiyimana ahita awumusubiza, Kevin agerageje guhindura umupira ashaka umutwe wa Ssentongo umupira urenzwa na Hussein bita Eto'o ariko Koruneri ntacyo ibyaye

18:22

23' Ikarita y'umuhondo ya kabiri ku ruhande rwa AS Kigali

Nyuma yo guhererekanya neza kwa Niyonzima Olivier Sefu na Bukuru Christopher, Faruk Ssentongo bitaga Ruhinda agerageje kubambura umupira yihuta ariko akorera ikosa Sefu rimuhesheje ikarita y'umuhondo

18:20

21' Michael Sarpong ashatse gutungura umunyezamu wa AS Kigali

Ikipe ya AS Kigali ikomeje kugarira neza cyane ku bakinnyi bayo Bishira Latif na Ngando Omar. Rayon Sports yananiwe kugera mu rubuga rw'amahina rwa AS Kigali. Rutahizamu Michael Sarpong agerageje guterera hanze y'urubuga rw'amahina ariko Bate Shamiru urindira abanyamujyi afata umupira bitamugoye

18:15

12' Ikarita ya mbere y'umuhondo ku ruhande rwa AS Kigali

Nyuma yo gutangira Rayon Sports ihererekanya neza, AS Kigali iri gukora amakosa menshi. Iradukunda Eric bita Radu akorewe ikosa na Nsabimana Eric Zidane bimuhesha ikarita y'umuhondo.

18:12

Mu mikino itanu iheruka, AS Kigali yatsinze rimwe

18:11

Rayon Sports igiye gukina uyu mukino iri mu bihe byiza

18:03

Rayon Sports yakoresheje abakinnyi babiri bari mu igeragezwa

Umutoza Robertinho yahaye umwanya abakinnyi bari mu igeragezwa barimo Robert Ndatimana wari umaze umwaka adakina umupira w'amaguru na Ndayisenga Kevin, rutahizamu w'Umurundi wakinaga muri Jomo Cosmos FC yo mu cyiciro cya kabiri muri Afurika y'epfo

17:58

Umukino uratangiye

Umusifuzi Ruzindana Nsoro atangije umukino ugiye guhuza Rayon Sports na AS Kigali

17:57

Abakinnyi 11 bagiye kubanza mu kibuga ku mpande zombi

AS Kigali: Bate Shamiru, Harerimana Rachid Leo, Niyomugabo Claude, Ngandu Omar, Bishira Latif, Ntate Djumaine, Ishimwe Kevin, Ntamuhanga Tumaine Titi, Nsabimana Eric Zidane, Ssentongo Faruk na Nshimiyimana Ibrahim



Rayon Sports: Andre Mazimpaka, Iradukunda Eric Radu, Eric Irambona, Manzi Thierry, Hussein Habimana, Robert Ndatimana, Donkor Prosper Kuka, Niyonzima Olivier Sefu, Bukuru Christopher, Michael Sarpong na Ndayisenga Kevin

17:56

Ihangana n'ubukeba bwa APR FC burakomeje muri Stade ya Kigali


Mu gihe abafana ba Rayon Sports bashyigikiye Etincelles FC ariko igatsindwa, n'abafana ba APR FC biteguye gushyigikira AS Kigali

17:54

17:52
